long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application allows Mitel MiCollab AWV web users to share application / screens and collaborate with other MiCollab AWV users in meeting. The application must be used in companion with MiCollab Share extension. Web sharing requires MiCollab release 7.2 or higher.
